spi/injector/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

spi/injector/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”

spi/injector/optical_pellet_diagnostic.documentation: Information related to the embedded optical pellet diagnostic

spi/injector/optical_pellet_diagnostic/p.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

spi/injector/optical_pellet_diagnostic/t.documentation: Arrival time at the optical pellet diagnostic, for each object

spi/injector/time_trigger.documentation: Time of trigger request to the power supply according to the DMS sequence

spi/injector/time_shatter.documentation: Arrival time at the shattering unit

spi/injector/pellet/position.documentation: Position of the centre of mass of the pellet

spi/injector/pellet/velocity_r.documentation: Major radius component of the velocity of the centre of mass of the pellet

spi/injector/pellet/velocity_z.documentation: Vertical component of the velocity of the centre of mass of the pellet

spi/injector/pellet/velocity_phi.documentation: Toroidal component of the velocity of the centre of mass of the pellet

spi/injector/pellet/velocity_shatter.documentation: Norm of the velocity of the centre of mass of the pellet right before shattering

spi/injector/pellet/shell.documentation: Shell-layer around of the unshattered pellet

spi/injector/pellet/shell/species.documentation: Atomic species in the shell composition

spi/injector/pellet/shell/species/name.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)

spi/injector/pellet/shell/atoms_n.documentation: Total number of atoms of desublimated gas

spi/injector/pellet/core/species.documentation: Atomic species in the shell composition

spi/injector/pellet/core/species/name.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)

spi/injector/pellet/core/atoms_n.documentation: Total number of atoms of desublimated gas

spi/injector/fragmentation_gas.documentation: Description of the gas produced during fragmentation

spi/injector/fragmentation_gas/flow_rate.documentation: Flow rate of the gas at the injector exit

spi/injector/fragmentation_gas/species.documentation: Atomic species in the gas composition

spi/injector/fragmentation_gas/species/n.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)

spi/injector/fragmentation_gas/atoms_n.documentation: Total number of atoms of the gas

spi/injector/propellant_gas/flow_rate.documentation: Flow rate of the gas at the injector exit

spi/injector/propellant_gas/species.documentation: Atomic species in the gas composition

spi/injector/propellant_gas/species/name.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)

spi/injector/propellant_gas/atoms_n.documentation: Total number of atoms of the gas

spi/injector/injection_direction.documentation: Unit vector of the unshattered pellet velocity direction right before shattering

spi/injector/shattering_position.documentation: Position where the pellet is shattered. It is defined as the intersection of the trayectory of the pellet center of mass with the shattering element

spi/injector/shattering_position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

spi/injector/shattering_angle.documentation: Impact (or grazing) angle of the pellet with the shattering element. It is the complementary of the incidence angle with the element surface at the shattering location

spi/injector/shatter_cone.documentation: Description of the elliptic shatter cone

spi/injector/shatter_cone/direction.documentation: Unit vector of the cone direction

spi/injector/shatter_cone/origin.documentation: Coordinates of the origin of the shatter cone

spi/injector/shatter_cone/origin/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

spi/injector/shatter_cone/unit_vector_ma.documentation: Major unit vector describing the geometry of the elliptic shatter cone

spi/injector/shatter_cone/unit_vector_mi.documentation: Minor unit vector describing the geometry of the elliptic shatter cone

spi/injector/shatter_cone/angle_major.documentation: Angle between the cone direction and unit_vector_major

spi/injector/shatter_cone/angle_minor.documentation: Angle between the cone direction and unit_vector_minor

spi/injector/velocity_mass_centre_fragme.documentation: Major radius component of the velocity of the centre of mass of the fragments at the shattering cone origin
Vertical component of the velocity velocity of the centre of mass of the fragments at the shattering cone origin
Toroidal component of the velocity of the centre of mass of the fragments at the shattering cone origin

spi/injector/fragment/position.documentation: Position of the centre of mass of the pellet

spi/injector/fragment/velocity_r.documentation: Major radius component of the fragment velocity

spi/injector/fragment/velocity_z.documentation: Vertical component of the fragment velocity

spi/injector/fragment/velocity_phi.documentation: Toroidal component of the fragment velocity

spi/injector/fragment/species.documentation: Atomic species in the fragment composition

spi/injector/fragment/species/name.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)

spi/shatter_cone_definition/index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

spi/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure.
